languages.text: {n}Рыжеволосый усмехается.{/n} "Так понятно получилось? В прозе эта сага звучит менее интересно".
{n}The giant chuckles.{/n} "Was that clear enough? This saga sounds less interesting in prose."
languages.original_text: {n}Рыжеволосый усмехается.{/n} "Так понятно получилось? В прозе эта сага звучит менее интересно".

languages.text: {n}这位巨人笑了起来。{/n}“这应该说得很清楚吧？若是用直白的语言讲出来，这个史诗恐怕就没那么有趣了。”
languages.original_text: {n}The giant chuckles.{/n} "Was that clear enough? This saga sounds less interesting in prose."

traits.locale_text: {n}这位巨人笑了起来。{/n}“这应该说得很清楚吧？若是用直白的语言讲出来，这个史诗恐怕就没那么有趣了。”

languages.text: {n}巨人は低く笑う。{/n}「わかったか？せっかくのサーガも切り取って伝えるとつまらなく聞こえるものだ」
languages.original_text: {n}The giant chuckles.{/n} "Was that clear enough? This saga sounds less interesting in prose."

traits.locale_text: {n}巨人は低く笑う。{/n}「わかったか？せっかくのサーガも切り取って伝えるとつまらなく聞こえるものだ」
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

languages.text: {n}El gigante se ríe.{/n} «¿Ha quedado claro? La saga pierde bastante en prosa».
languages.original_text: {n}The giant chuckles.{/n} "Was that clear enough? This saga sounds less interesting in prose."

traits.locale_text: {n}El gigante se ríe.{/n} «¿Ha quedado claro? La saga pierde bastante en prosa».
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

languages.text: {n}Le géant pousse un petit rire.{/n} « C'était assez clair ? Cette saga est bien moins intéressante en prose. »
languages.original_text: {n}The giant chuckles.{/n} "Was that clear enough? This saga sounds less interesting in prose."

languages.text: {n}Der Riese kichert.{/n} "Was das klar genug? In Prosa klingt die Saga lange nicht so interessant."
languages.original_text: {n}The giant chuckles.{/n} "Was that clear enough? This saga sounds less interesting in prose."

languages.text: {n}Dev, kıkır kıkır gülüyor.{/n} "Yeterince açık anlatabildim mi? Bu destanı dümdüz anlattığında bu kadar ilginç olmuyor."
languages.original_text: {n}The giant chuckles.{/n} "Was that clear enough? This saga sounds less interesting in prose."

traits.locale_text: {n}Dev, kıkır kıkır gülüyor.{/n} Yeterince açık mıydı? Bu destanı edebî anlattığında bu kadar ilginç olmuyor."
